title: Fading
description: Lilith Parker has loved five people in her life.Three of them are dead, one of them is now the bane of her existence and the other one, well, heâ€™s not really around anymore. Changing is never easy, especially when it means breaking a five year habit, but help from the last person she expects or wants it from may be the only thing that saves her.The only thing Lilith craves is a happy ending to her pathetically sad life, but getting it means doing the one thing that might kill her.
author: Rachel Spanswick
